climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

features: Face Cream: This Intense Hydration Face Cream features Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil, Hyaluronic Acid and a healthy dose of nutrient-replenishing Mineral Water for skin that’s plump, hydrated and full of bounce
Natural Formula: Bursting with age-defying, collagen-boosting, skin-loving antioxidant goodness. Soothing Aloe, Lavender, and Cucumber infuse your skin with calming vibes for a healthy-looking glow

Smarter Makeup: Improve your complexion and nourish your skin with our line of lip tints, eyeshadows, brushes, foundations, nail polishes, mascaras, primers, eyeliners, moisturizers, face creams and cleansers

Natural Cosmetics: We select effective natural ingredients and ensure our products are free of gluten, parabens, talc, artificial colors, synthetic fragrances, SLS and phthalates. We NEVER conduct animal testing
Healthy Beauty: Mineral Fusion offers a wide range of nail polish, hair care, body care and skin care - each formulated to deliver the uniquely beneficial power of minerals. Products made in the USA
body.description: Perfectly plumped skin, this way. A hydration powerhouse, Mineral Fusion’s Intense Hydration Face Cream boasts a mix of nourishing Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil, Hyaluronic Acid, and a healthy dose of nutrient-replenishing Mineral Water for skin that’s so plump, so hydrated, so full of bounce. Soothing Aloe, Lavender, and Cucumber infuse your skin with the calming vibes it needs for a healthy-looking glow. Best of all: help promote plumper, firmer skin with natural antioxidants that work behind the scenes to increase your skin’s elastic powers (aka, bounce), while a clinically tested, collagen-boosting peptide helps ensure more youthful skin over time. Smooth on clean, toned skin. Use a.m. or p.m (or both). Intense hydration for bouncy, plump, softer-than-soft skin. Creates smooth skin for the smoothest makeup application. Nourishing botanicals feel good on your skin (and conscience). Bursting with age-defying, collagen-boosting, skin-loving antioxidant goodness. Everything to feel good about: Hypoallergenic - Cruelty Free - Vegan - Gluten Free - No Harsh Ingredients - Paraben Free - Phthalate Free

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We Leave Your Skin And Hair In Better Condition Than We Found It. Mineral Fusion products are a fusion of rich pigments and natural high performing ingredients, that focus on correcting flaws, not just covering them up. Mineral Fusion Skin Care Cleanse, Tone, Moisturize & Treat Healthy & Effective Skin Care: We’ve formulated our skin care with essential minerals and nourishing botanicals that work in harmony to restore and enhance your natural beauty – just as they do in nature. Everything to Feel Good About: Hypoallergenic, Cruelty Free, Vegan, Gluten Free, No Harsh Ingredients, Fragrance Free, Paraben Free, and Phthalate Free

Purifying Gel Cleanser Skin-Renewing Facial Scrub Skin-Soothing Facial Toner Intense Hydration Face Cream Revitalizing Eye Treatment Mineral SPF 40 Face Moisturizer Order of Application Step 1 Step 2 Step 3 Step 4 Step 5 Step 6 Description Dissolves dirt with its foaming action, leaving your skin feeling fresh and so clean. Creates a perfectly smooth canvas for effortless makeup application.. Finely ground Garnet, Sea Clay, and Walnut give this scrub its physically exfoliating powers that buff away dullness to reveal your skin’s natural vibrance. Anytime, anywhere skin pick-me-up. Mineral Fusion’s Skin-Soothing Face Toner is a refreshing toner in a handy spritz for 24-7 hydration on the go. A hydration powerhouse, for skin that’s so plump, so hydrated, so full of bounce. Bursting with age-defying, collagen-boosting, skin-loving antioxidant goodness. Your source for plumping, wrinkle-fighting powers thanks to skin-firming peptides and natural antioxidants that work together to smooth away fine lines. Naturally UV resistant minerals team up with clinically tested, wrinkle-fighting peptides and natural antioxidants to help firm and smooth skin for a plump, youthful look. Key Ingredients Sea Clay Papain, Bromelain, Licorice Root, Aloe Vera, Cucumber, Lavender & Rosemary Mineral Water, Hyaluronic Acid, Aloe & Lavender, Shea Butter, Rosehip Oil, Hyaluronic Acid & Peptides Hyaluronic Acid, Rosehip Oil & Peptides Mineral Water, Shea Butter & Peptides
Explore all of Mineral Fusion's Products:

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing vegan, cruelty free moisturizer!
reviews.reviewText: Mineral Fusion Facial Moisturizer is my absolute go-to! The fact that it's vegan and cruelty-free is a major win. It blends like a dream, and has a nice light scent. Works wonders for keeping my face hydrated, especially on cold winter days. I've bought this multiple times, and it never fails to impress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2014
reviews.reviewText: I never thought I would find a facial moisturizer that would work for me. I have tried many brands and none of them worked as well as Mineral Fusion. I have finally found the one! I am Chinese and have very sensitive skin. It's hard to find the right face moisturizer for Asian skin. My friend introduced me to Mineral Fusion and let me try hers, I loved it the first try and wanted to buy it on Amazon.In the Winter I have dry patches on my face. So far I have used it for a month and I was surprised that my skin complexion looked brighter and felt softer in the first week. Also, I haven't had a single outbreak of pimples, acne, or blackheads since then. It smells like natural aroma from Earth and it's soothing in the evening.I recommend this to anyone that has dry sensitive skin, and any normal skin type. It is very gentle and light, not harsh. It will feel like you're applying lotion on your face, except it's very light and non oily. It leaves your skin feeling moisturized and rejuvenated! And even if the price may be more than you'd like, it is WORTH IT.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it says and more!
reviews.reviewText: I used to purchase at whole foods, but found that Amazon sells it for cheaper. I started using this moisturizer over 5 years ago, and I have to say, it's my favorite, even amongst expensive brands. The scent is subtle and natural. Your skin becomes less dry and it has a firming effect. The ingredients are skin friendly, which is a major plus. I hope they never stop making this cream. It truly transformed my face..in a good way 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like the product but I find the scent to be kinda musky - grandma-y. Even my husband made a comment haha. It's not bad enough to stop using the product but I'm not sure I'd order it again. It seems to work fine moisturizing but it hasn't been like life changing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mild, environmentally safe, works beautifully
reviews.reviewText: Been using this moisturizer for 8+ years. Works perfectly 10 months out of the year on the US East Coast. July and August are too sweaty to wear it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love the all natural scent of lavender and the way it soothes my dry skin. I think it's a great price for the size of tube.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this cream. I’ve now ordered it many times. The weight and texture are perfect. It absorbs well into the skin. It is neither greasy nor sticky. It works well under makeup. I am 67 and have used dozens of creams over the years. This one is as good as an expensive Lancôme product I used long ago. Best of all, it’s cruelty free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Feels so good but may cause breakouts
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love the feel of this lotion on my skin. It's light weight, soft, and moisturizing. After reading reviews from others, I was worried it would be a heavy lotion but it's not. I was also worried about breaking out after using it as several people wrote that it caused breakouts on their face. I've used it for about a month now and at first everything seemed great. I didn't have any breakouts. And all of a sudden in the last week, I have. But who knows, it could be due to other factors (diet, cycle, etc.).I plan to finish off the bottle I have. Once the few breakout I have disappear, I'll try using it on my face again and see if I break out again. In the meantime, I'm using it on my hands at night because the lotion is so restorative. It's great on my hands and feet.I love knowing that there aren't any harsh chemicals in this and that it has a great rating on the EWG. So I really hope it works out! I'd recommend trying this out though. It feels so amazing, that I'm sure I'll continue to purchase it.
El producto llegó a tiempo en óptimas condiciones, el tamaño es práctico, la crema no es grasa, no noto grandes beneficios, producto cualquiera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 4, 2017
reviews.reviewText: Lovely product. Wish it was cheaper to ship to / source in the UK!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 15, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: It was ok... I didn't feel as ...
reviews.reviewText: It was ok... I didn't feel as though I was being intensely moisturised but for the price I can't complain really.
